alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 2:27PM MDT until April 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM MDT FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches up to pass level. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains and East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow are expected Friday. The heavier bands of snow may reduce visibility down to a half mile or less and cause road surfaces to become slushy and or slippery.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; East Glacier Park Region
